scripts.kill-ports: powershell -Command "$ports = @(3000, 8080, 5173); foreach($port in $ports) { $process = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -First 1; if($process) { Write-Host \"Killing process $process on port $port\"; Stop-Process -Id $process -Force } else { Write-Host \"Port $port is already free\" } }"
scripts.test:theme: npm run kill-ports && playwright test theme-init-darkmode.spec.js --headed
